name: Technology Marketing Corporation (TMC)
overview: Founded as a one man rep organization in 1975 with its headquarters in Carmel Indiana, TMC has grown to become one of the Midwest’s fastest growing manufacturer’s representative firms. Now in its 34th year, TMC has 5 Brick and Mortar Offices and 6 Home Offices spread across the US Midwest (Indiana, Michigan, Kentucky, Ohio, W.PA and W.VA) and Hong Kong, China. Currently we have 26 highly experienced employees actively involved with calling on our customer base to support our principal’s design in efforts. TMC’s long-term success stems from an unwavering commitment to be the industry’s best representative as measured by our customers, manufacturers, and distributors. TMC has demonstrated this commitment through the many years via reinvestments in its people, its facilities, and the systems developed to better service its customers and principals.
